channel.title: Mumble Server (better than ventrilo)
channel.description:
If I started up a [url=http://mumble.sourceforge.net/]Mumble[/url] server would people from here use it? I never wanted to start a ventrilo or teamspeak server because of the horrible restrictions, but this looks quite good.
For those of you unfamiliar to mumble, the official client runs on Windows, Mac, Linux, iPhone and Android and it is 100% open source.

item.title: Mumble Server (better than ventrilo)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Could be useful, a lot of us mitbers idle on #rts and have games every now and then but we never have a vent server to use.

On the plus side if it isn’t used much then it won’t use a lot of resources!

Read full topic

item.title: Mumble Server (better than ventrilo)
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

The fact that it runs on Android and iOS sounds interesting :o

It’s worth a try?

Read full topic
